title: Riot Games now completely owned by Tencent.
body:
http://www.polygon.com/2015/12/16/10326320/riot-games-now-owned-entirely-by-tencent?utm_campaign=polygon&utm_content=chorus&utm_medium=social&utm_source=twitter
(huge apologies for the polygon link it's the only one i found and i really really cant be fucked looking for something else)

I find this hilarious.

For those who did not know, Tencent already held 93% equity interest in Riot games, but now they own everything.

If you're still a LoL player I feel bad for you, I really do.
